panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage
TOP-5 Most long-running queries by mean_time second

panels.description: Connected sessions, including Postgres internal processes like Autovacuum. < 1 Warn / > 300 Error thresholds by default
panels.title: Active sessions

panels.description: 1 Minute rate of transactions committed or rollback.
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description:
* blk_read_time: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds
* blk_write_time: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds

track_io_timings needs to be activated
panels.title: I/O Read/Write time

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.
